ABOUT

Howdy, folks. I’m Sarah – a creator by blood, a web developer by trade, and an adventurer at heart. I’m currently residing in Omaha, Neb., and studying web development at Omaha Code School. This website is a compilation of my professional and personal projects. Enjoy.
